alert_msg2.message: Congrats! Auto Refresh Plus Installed Successfully

alert_tabs_desc.message: Show alert tabs in the extension popup to see any updates or changes made by the page monitor. This feature provides a convenient way to stay informed, especially when you have many tabs open.

alert_tabs_title.message: Show Alert Tabs in Extension Popup

any_msg.message: Auto Refresh Plus will notify you when any change occurs on this website.

app_description.message: Refresh the page automatically with powerful page monitor features.

are_you_sure.message: Are you sure you want to delete?

as_msg4.message: Auto Refresh Plus will auto-start the page reload function when these URLs are opened in your browser. It also opens all of these URLs when your browser restarts and begins auto-refreshing at the desired interval.

ast_msg1.message: Automatically start refreshing when these URLs are opened. One URL per line, e.g.,

ast_msg2.message: Autostart refreshing these URLs when the browser restarts.

auto_clicker_msg2.message: (If monitored text or regex has a link)

bulk_keywords_msg.message: For bulk keywords, use a space after each comma

change_site_desc.message: If the website's URL changes while Auto Refresh Plus is running, it will automatically update to follow the new URL or stay on the original URL. This ensures that the page continues to refresh correctly without any interruptions.

cs_t3.message: When Page Monitor Finds Target Text

cs_t4.message: When Page Monitor Loses Target Text

default_target_input.message: Multiple text/regex supported, press Enter to add another.

detect_any_change.message: Auto Refresh Plus has detected a change on this website.

developer_mode_msg.message:
For security and stability reasons, developer mode is not permitted.
Please download and install the extension from the official store to ensure you have latest and most secure version

donation_msg.message:
Hi from the Auto Refresh Plus team.
If you found Auto Refresh Plus helpful, please consider a donation to the author.

email_msg.message: Please note, this setting is only for adding an email. To receive email alerts, enable Receive Email Alert in the extension popup > Page monitor section for each webpage.

email_sent_to.message: A verification code has been sent to

export_desc.message: To preserve your settings, export your Auto Refresh Plus configuration and restore it later on the same or a different computer.

focus_description.message: Enable window focus when Page Monitor finds or loses a keyword. This feature ensures that the window automatically comes to the forefront of your screen whenever the specified keyword is detected or lost.

focus_title.message: Enable Window Focus on Keyword Detection

full_page_help.message: Auto Refresh Plus will notify you when any change occurs on this webpage.

hard_refresh_msg.message: (Reload the page without relying on cached data)

idea_cs_bussiness_desc.message: Auto Refresh Plus offers tailored solutions for your business's unique requirements. Our team can create custom scripts to execute specific actions on webpages. Note that custom solutions are provided at an additional cost, with pricing based on complexity. Contact us to discuss your needs further.

idea_cs_general_desc.message: If your script also fulfills other users needs, we will write it for free and publish it publicly on the Auto Refresh Plus script marketplace.

idea_cs_title.message: Do you have any ideas for custom scripts?

idea_custom_scripts_business.message: Custom Solutions for Businesses with Unique Needs

ignore_input_field_desc.message: Continue refreshing even when you click or type inside input fields.

import_desc.message: To retain your settings, import your Auto Refresh Plus configuration by using the import button. This allows you to restore your settings on either the same or a different computer.

interactions_msg.message: Auto Refresh Plus will pause refreshing the page if you click the mouse or use the keyboard. Enable this feature here for all websites, or enable it for individual pages/websites from the extension popup.

interactions_msg_opt.message: Automatically pause refreshing if you interact with the page or start typing in an input field.

invalid_code_email.message: The provided verification code is invalid.

key_missing.message: Auto Refresh Plus is active, but key features are missing.

not_allowed.message: You are not allowed to use it here.

not_allowed_to_use.message: You are not allowed to use this feature.

noti_msg.message: Auto Refresh Plus has $action$ your target text.

notifications_moved_msg.message: Notification settings have been moved to a separate section

opt_msg10.message: When a notification arrives, a short sound will play to alert you. You can customize this setting by turning the sound off or choosing a different sound to play for notifications.

opt_msg11.message: Customize the maximum duration of the sound that plays when a notification arrives.

opt_msg12.message: Receive email notifications when a website changes according to your page monitor settings. This ensures you stay updated with any modifications without constantly checking the site.

opt_msg13.message: Execute Custom Scripts on the Page

opt_msg14.message: If you love playing with automation, scraping, changing default website behavior, and have some basic knowledge of JavaScript, there’s a lot you can do here.

opt_msg16.message: To match both HTTP and HTTPS, just write `example.com`

opt_msg17.message: To match every page on a domain, write `example.com/*`

opt_msg18.message: To match every page on a domain and its subdomains, write `*.example.com/*`

opt_msg19.message: Set Your Custom Keyboard Shortcuts for Auto Refresh Plus Actions

opt_msg2.message: Autostart Refresh When Any of These URLs Open

opt_msg21.message: Resetting your Auto Refresh Plus settings will revert all customizations and configurations to their default state. This includes the loss of all personalized settings, saved session data, and site-specific preferences. Please note that this action is irreversible, and once reset, it is not possible to recover the previous configurations. Proceed with caution

opt_msg22.message: Congrats! Auto Refresh Plus Installed Successfully

opt_msg3.message: Insert one or multiple keywords here, and as soon as any are found on the web page, Auto Refresh Plus will begin auto page refreshing at the default interval frequency.

opt_msg4.message: Enter a specific URL here to refresh this URL, rather than the current tab you’re using. So, for example, if you save Google.com into the settings and then start the auto-refresh while on Yahoo.com, Google.com will be refreshing, rather than the page you’re looking at.

opt_msg6.message: Perform a page refresh on a specific page after a certain amount of time has passed, Auto Refresh Plus’s countdown timer lets you do it. Simply enable and set the time, and the countdown timer will begin. Once the countdown reaches zero, Auto Refresh Plus will begin refreshing the page again at the set default intervals.

opt_msg7.message: Countdown Mode Added in Auto Refresh Plus Popup

opt_msg8.message: Add default monitoring keywords here. You can also add custom keywords for each website from the extension popup.

opt_msg9.message: Automatically get notified when any given webpage has found or lost your defined keyword.

pm_msg2.message: Play Until I Click the Notification Box

pmp_msg1.message: Popup Notification Once It FINDS the Target Text (or regex)

pmp_msg2.message: Popup Notification Once It LOSES the Target Text (or regex)

predefined_url_alert.message: Enabling the "Refresh Predefined URL" feature will limit all auto-refresh functions to the specified URL only that you write  in this input. You will not be able to refresh any other URLs when this feature is active.

random_interval_warning.message: Min value should be less than max value.

ratings_msg.message: Please rate us five stars on the webstore.

refresh_number_msg.message: (Set how many times you want to refresh.)

reset_alert_msg.message: Are you sure you want to reset all settings to their default values? This action cannot be undone. If you are sure, please type RESET in the input field below.

restart_opt_msg.message: Auto Refresh Plus will continue to refresh the page even if it finds or loses the monitored keyword. It will still trigger a notification, email, or bell depending on your page monitor's settings.

retain_desc.message: Select the time duration to retain the record of Alerted Tabs before they automatically disappear.

rpt_input1.message: Multiple text/regex supported, press Enter to add another.

scroll_to_keyword_desc.message: Automatically scroll the page to the location of the specified keyword when it is found.

sign_up_desc.message: Sign up now to unlock the following:

source_msg.message: (Find inside the inline text in HTML source code.)

stop_refresh_click_desc.message: Pause the auto-refresh whenever you click the mouse.

stop_refresh_keyboard_desc.message: Pause the auto-refresh whenever you press any key.

temporary_pause.message: Temporarily Pause Auto-Refresh on Interaction for a Specified Period

temporary_pause_desc.message: Pause the auto-refresh on mouse click or keyboard activity for a specified period, and automatically re-enable it if no interaction is detected during that time.

ti_msg1.message: Set the default time for every page refresh. You can select either the predefined time intervals or provide your custom time interval from the extension popup.

ti_msg2.message: Randomize the time interval of each page refresh that Auto Refresh Plus makes. All that you need to do is choose a minimum and maximum time duration, and the extension will perform automatic page refreshes between the defined range.

ti_msg3.message: Random Interval Function Added in Auto Refresh Plus Popup

unsubscribe_alert.message: Are you sure you want to unsubscribe?

up_msg1.message: Auto Refresh Plus Updated to Version

up_msg4.message: Context-Menu for Adding Text to Page Monitor

up_msg5.message: Refresh Without Full Refresh in Page

visual_msg.message: (Find inside the text you see on the visual screen.)

visual_timer_desc.message: Control where the visual timer appears on the page. Choose the display position that suits you best for showing the visual counter.

visual_timer_msg.message: Show Visual Timer on the Webpage

visual_timer_msg_opt.message: By default, enable visual timer for all pages you will refresh. If disabled, you can enable this feature individually from the extension popup.

wildcard_not_supported.message: Wildcard URLs are not supported on Browser restart.

without_msg2.message: How Does Auto Click a Button?

xhr_page_help.message: Retrieve data from a URL without having to do a full page refresh. This enables a web page to update just part of a page without disrupting what the user is doing.

you_has_exceeded_the_limit.message: You have exceeded the limit of this feature.
